data.title: BERTRAND RUSSELL AWARDED NOBEL PRIZE
data.meta_description: Nobel literary prizes for 1949 and 1950 were to-day awarded to William Faulkner an American novelist, and ...
data.text:
Nobel literary prizes for

1949 and 1950 were to-day

awarded to William.Faulkner,

an American novelist, and

Bertrand Russell, British phil-

osopher, who recently visited

Australia, respectively.

Prize money for Bertrand

Russell is £11,300 stg. Faulk-

ner will receive '£10,700 stg..

With the election of Ber-

trand Russell the .awarding

body abandoned the purely

literal line for the first time

in 23 years.
